.. _react.i18n:

==========================================
i18n in React
==========================================


.. contents::
   :depth: 1
   :local:

Cheat sheet
===========


- In a js or jsx source code file, ``this.ex.i18n.t("Hello, world!")`` marks
  "Hello, world!" as a translatable message.

- :cmd:`npm run build` will update the files below

- :cmd:`npm run mm`



.. command:: npm run mm
